short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Live NBA scores, odds, boxscores & more!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you to view NBA game details all in one click!


3.0 Update ( 11/24/2024)
-Time zone bug fix
-Added user feedback page

2.9 Update (11/20/2024)
-Users will now see the game start times in their time zone

-Design Changes

-Small fixes

2.6 Update (11/21/2023)
-Added team stats
-Added colors for linescores
-Added percentages for FG, TP and FT stats (shows on mouse hover)
-Added positions next to player names
-Fixed losing team score color

2.5 Update (11/19/2023)
-Complete code rewrite
-Linescores added
-New options page
-Design changes
-Removed auto-refresh button (Needs fixed)
-Removed pre-game odds (Needs fixed)
